posts.postText:
Offender name: Fresh Blood
Offender's Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:7274447
What the Offender did:  This morning he was RDMing everyone, multiple rounds, and then he was karma banned. Later today he came back and started rdming again.
Were there any admins on at the time?: Only VIPS who tried to voteban but the bans always failed.
Proof:  http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm57/JoshJosh117/ttt_iceresearchlabs_rc20003.jpg

I'll ban him when i get on.

*done*
maybe a perma was too much? O_o
if he regrets it he can just post an unban req anyways.
